column4: Tesla seeks $1.5 billion junk bond issue to fund Model 3 production
column5: DETROIT Tesla Inc  said on Monday it would raise about $1.5 billion through its first-ever offering of junk bonds as the U.S. luxury electric car maker seeks fresh sources of cash to ramp up production of its new Model 3 sedan. | Video

column4: Tesla rally pushes funds  ETFs into big bets on shares
column5: NEW YORK Tesla Inc's more than 66 percent rally for the year is prompting some funds to make an outsized bet on the electric car maker.
